## BotBuilderCloudAdapter.TeamsBotInstallation.getTeamDetails() method

Get team details from this bot installation

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getTeamDetails(): Promise<TeamDetails | undefined>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;TeamDetails \| undefined&gt;

The team details if bot is installed into a team, otherwise returns `undefined`<!-- -->.
